column1: # https://kafka.apache.org/documentation/#kafka_streams_thread_monitoring
commit-latency-avg 	The average execution time in ms for committing
column2: across all running tasks of this thread. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics

column1: commit-latency-max 	The maximum execution time in ms for committing across all running tasks of this thread. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
poll-latency-avg 	The average execution time in ms for polling
column2: across all running tasks of this thread. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics

column1: poll-latency-max 	The maximum execution time in ms for polling across all running tasks of this thread. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
process-latency-avg 	The average execution time in ms for processing
column2: across all running tasks of this thread. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics

column1: process-latency-max 	The maximum execution time in ms for processing across all running tasks of this thread. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
punctuate-latency-avg 	The average execution time in ms for punctuating
column2: across all running tasks of this thread. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics

column1: punctuate-latency-max 	The maximum execution time in ms for punctuating across all running tasks of this thread. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
commit-rate 	The average number of commits per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
commit-total 	The total number of commit calls across all tasks. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
poll-rate 	The average number of polls per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
poll-total 	The total number of poll calls across all tasks. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
process-rate 	The average number of process calls per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
process-total 	The total number of process calls across all tasks. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
punctuate-rate 	The average number of punctuates per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
punctuate-total 	The total number of punctuate calls across all tasks. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
task-created-rate 	The average number of newly created tasks per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
task-created-total 	The total number of tasks created. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
task-closed-rate 	The average number of tasks closed per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
task-closed-total 	The total number of tasks closed. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
skipped-records-rate 	The average number of skipped records per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
skipped-records-total 	The total number of skipped records. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-metrics
